titles.title: now unto you who fear my name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To you who fear My name, the Son of
Righteousness shall rise,
With healing in His wings;
With healing in His wings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And you shall skip about for joy
Like calves led from the stall,
And you shall tread the wicked down,
Thus saith the Lord of all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
A los que temen Mi nombre, nacera el sol de justicia,
Y en Sus alas traerá sanidad y salvacion.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Cual becerros de la manada de gozo saltaréis,
Y hollaréis a el maligno, ha dicho el Señor.
